comments.body: You can move the failure up to the previous if-statement. Thats the only place it could be set to failure at this point.

You should include the headers for each symbol that you are using in this file. 

EG: In line 68, we call TF_GetCode, which is declared in tensorflow/c/tf_status.h; we need to include that header directly, and add a build dependency on it as well.

Similarly, there should be inclusions for:
tensorflow/core/platform/protobuf.h due to "SerializeToTstring"
tensorflow/core/platform/logging.h due to "CHECK"
/tensorflow/core/platform/macros.h due to "TF_ATTRIBUTE_UNUSED"
tensorflow/core/platform/tstring.h due to "tstring"
tensorflow/core/platform/strcat.h due to tf::strings::StrCat

etc
